targets.query: SELECT min(mean_value) +5 AS min_mean_value FROM ( SELECT mean("value") AS mean_value FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3h) fill(null)) GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT distinct("value") FROM "restingHeartRate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
select above from (SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) as above FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) where above > 95
select below from (SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) as below FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) where below < 60

SELECT mean("value") FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT count("value") /11500 FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "heartrate" WHERE time < '2023-03-05 00:00:00' GROUP BY time(2m) fill(0)

SELECT distinct("value") FROM "hourly_steps" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT count(*) as selected FROM (SELECT count(steps) as total FROM "activity" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)) WHERE total < 10  GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT count(*) as selected FROM (SELECT count(steps) as total FROM "activity" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)) WHERE total > 10 GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT count(*) as selected FROM (SELECT count(steps) as total FROM (SELECT distinct(value) as steps FROM "hourly_steps" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) WHERE steps > 0 GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)) WHERE total < 10 AND time < '2023-03-06 00:00:00' GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT count(*) as selected FROM (SELECT count(steps) as total FROM (SELECT distinct(value) as steps FROM "hourly_steps" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) WHERE steps > 0 GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)) WHERE total > 10 AND time < '2023-03-06 00:00:00' GROUP BY time(1d)
